title: Mt. Everest
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Lukla; Day 2-8: Trek through Phakding, Namche Bazaar, Tengboche, Dingboche, and Gorak Shep to Base Camp. Ticket: No specific entry fee; permits (TIMS and Sagarmatha National Park entry) are required, costing around $50. Hotels: Yeti Mountain Home in Lukla, Everest View Hotel in Namche Bazaar. Travel Cost: Plane - $180 one way from Kathmandu to Lukla; Road - $20 by bus to Jiri, then trek. Best Season: April-May and October-November for clear skies and moderate weather. Recommended: Daytime for the stunning views of Everest and surrounding peaks.

title: Mt. Annapurna
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Drive to Nayapul; Day 2-7: Trek through Tikhedhunga, Ghorepani, Tadapani, and finally Annapurna Base Camp. Ticket: Entry permit for the Annapurna Conservation Area ($20). Hotels: Gurung Lodge in Ghorepani, Himalayan Lodge in Tadapani. Travel Cost: Plane - $120 one way to Pokhara; Road - $10 by bus to Pokhara. Best Season: March-May and September-November for vibrant trails and clear weather. Recommended: Daytime for panoramic mountain views.

title: Rara Lake
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Flight to Talcha Airport; Day 2-3: Trek to Rara Lake. Ticket: Entry permit for Rara National Park ($15). Hotels: Rara Resort in Mugu. Travel Cost: Plane - $150 one way to Talcha; Road - $25 by bus to the nearest town, then trek. Best Season: April-May and September-October for pleasant weather and clear skies. Recommended: Daytime for the stunning blue lake views surrounded by lush hills.

title: Tilicho Lake
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Drive to Chame; Day 2-5: Trek through Pisang and Manang to Tilicho Lake. Ticket: Annapurna Conservation Area permit ($20). Hotels: Tilicho Base Camp Lodge, Hotel Manang in Manang. Travel Cost: Plane - $120 one way to Pokhara; Road - $10 by bus to Pokhara, then trek. Best Season: April-May and September-October for a snow-free trek and clear skies. Recommended: Daytime for the pristine turquoise lake views.

title: Mustang
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Drive or fly to Jomsom; Day 2-6: Trek through Kagbeni, Muktinath, and Lo Manthang. Ticket: Restricted Area Permit ($500 for 10 days). Hotels: Hotel Majesty in Jomsom, Royal Mustang Resort in Lo Manthang. Travel Cost: Plane - $120 one way to Jomsom; Road - $35 by jeep or bus to Jomsom. Best Season: May-August for unique landscapes and festivals. Recommended: Daytime for vivid desert-like terrain and cultural sights.

title: Pokhara
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Explore Phewa Lake, Gupteshwor Cave; Day 2: Sarangkot sunrise, Deviâ€™s Fall, and International Mountain Museum. Ticket: No entry fee for lakeside; cave and museum entry fees are minimal (approx. $5). Hotels: Hotel Fewa, Pokhara View Garden. Travel Cost: Plane - $100 one way; Road - $10 by bus to Pokhara. Best Season: Year-round, especially October-November and March-May. Recommended: Sunrise at Sarangkot and evening lakeside for serene reflections.

title: Bouddhanath
desc: Itinerary: Spend 1-2 hours exploring the stupa, surrounding monasteries, and Tibetan shops. Ticket: $2 per person for entry. Hotels: Shambhala Hotel, Hotel Tara. Travel Cost: Road - $5 by taxi or local bus. Best Season: Year-round. Recommended: Evening for mesmerizing views of the stupa lit up.

title: Lumbini
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Explore Mayadevi Temple and Monastic Zone. Ticket: $2 for the Sacred Garden entry. Hotels: Lumbini Garden Resort, Hotel Buddha. Travel Cost: Plane - $150 one way to Bhairahawa; Road - $15 by bus. Best Season: October-March for cool and comfortable weather. Recommended: Daytime for exploring the tranquil spiritual gardens.

title: Patan Durbar Square
address: Patan Durbar Square, Kathmandu Valley, https://goo.gl/maps/W3s94RuTn8t
desc: Itinerary: Spend 2-3 hours exploring temples, courtyards, and the Patan Museum. Ticket: $10 per person for entry. Hotels: Hotel Heritage, Patan Guest House. Travel Cost: Road - $3 by taxi or local bus. Best Season: Year-round. Recommended: Evening for vibrant cultural ambiance with illuminated architecture.

title: Chitwan National Park
desc: Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Sauraha; Day 2-3: Jungle safari, canoe rides, and elephant bathing. Ticket: Entry fee of $15 per person. Hotels: Barahi Jungle Lodge, Jungle Safari Lodge. Travel Cost: Plane - $130 one way to Bharatpur; Road - $10 by bus to Sauraha. Best Season: October-March for ideal wildlife sightings. Recommended: Early morning for wildlife safari and evening for sunset over the grasslands.

title: Pashupatinath Temple
desc: Itinerary: Spend 2-3 hours exploring the temple complex and watching traditional rituals by the Bagmati River. Ticket: $10 per person for foreign visitors. Hotels: Hotel Nirvana, Pashupatinath Guest House. Travel Cost: Road - $3 by taxi or local bus. Best Season: Year-round. Recommended: Evening for witnessing the mesmerizing 'Aarti' ceremony.

title: Thamel
desc: Itinerary: Explore the vibrant streets of Thamel, bustling with shops, restaurants, and adventure gear. Ticket: No entry fee. Hotels: Hotel Yak & Yeti, The Sparkling Turtle. Travel Cost: Road - Easily accessible by taxi or walk. Best Season: Year-round. Recommended: Nighttime for lively ambiance with bustling streets and illuminated lights.
